description: [MarkiRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0652) can download additional files and tools from its C2 server, including through the use of [BITSAdmin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0190).(Citation: Kaspersky Ferocious Kitten Jun 2021)

external_references.description: GReAT. (2021, June 16). Ferocious Kitten: 6 Years of Covert Surveillance in Iran. Retrieved September 22, 2021.
